meanings.definition: A type of rock formed from the accumulation of calcium carbonate deposits.
meanings.sent1: The calctuff in the cave sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: Geologists study calctuff to understand Earth's history.
meanings.sent3: The kids pretended the calctuff was a magical crystal.
meanings.sent4: The calctuff walls of the canyon held secrets of ancient times.
meanings.sent5: The calctuff formations resembled delicate lace curtains.
